ArkhamAsylum.text: In the Doctor"s study, you find a book of helpful notes gathered from inmate interviews. Make a lore(+0) check and consult the following chart 0) Their stories fill you with horror even as you learn a few bits of knowledge. Lose 1 sanity and gain 1 Clue token. 1-2) You find several pieces of useful information. Gain 2 Clue tokens. 3+) One of the interviews contains vital information. Gain 3 Clue tokens.

IndependenceSquare.text: A pair of friendly picnickers share their lunch with you. Gain 1 stamnina.

BankOfArkham.text: One of the other customers in the banm recognizes you and offers you a lift. Move to any location or street area in Arkham. If you move to a location, immediately have an encounter there.
